headline: Professor Disciplined For Rejecting Preferred Pronouns Wins Huge Settlement
author: Jess Lawson
sentences: As reported by Fox News, in June 2018 a philosophy professor at Shawnee State University named Nick Meriwether was formally disciplined by the university for his refusal to use a student’s preferred pronouns.
A written warning was placed in Meriwether’s permanent file with a promise to apply “further corrective actions” if similar incidents occurred in the future.
One professor at a university in Ohio has provided a blueprint on how to hit them where it hurts: In their bank accounts.
We can bow to the woke mob and surrender our culture to their insanity, or we can take a stand and push back.
